data.text: @hhow09_ Greetings, do you check through your baggage to Taipei?
@Farah25684040 Hi, Farah. as bookings made through travel agents have different terms and conditions, your travel agent will be best able to assist.
@KipClips Greetings, you can check the ticket number from the booking confirmation email.
@JCVicio In this case, you have to contact your departure city which Brussels is right.

@JCVicio In this case, we suggest you contact our THAI office in Brussels via (32-2) 502 47 44 Mon-Fri (9-17hrs) or send an email to reservations@thaiairways.be by attaching your booking number, full name, date, route, and your requirement to get the information about this issue.
@JCVicio Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@Tejas44309997 @HardeepSPuri We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to refund or make any alterations to your ticket, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case.

@Tejas44309997 @HardeepSPuri In this case, you have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@JackGulston @MartinSLewis We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@minttmint Thank you so much. You are most welcome.
@balanuj Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@MartinSLewis Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@MartinSLewis Greetings, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to refund or make any alterations to your ticket.

@sumi_halder8 Greetings, if you would like to refund please contact 
- net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com and send by specifying the following information: 
1. Traveler's name-surname in English
2. Ticket reservation code
3. Travel date
4. Details you need to inquire
@Tejas44309997 @HardeepSPuri May we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Tejas44309997 @HardeepSPuri If you are holding a valid ticket for an international flight and you have already used part of your ticket, a refund amount will be calculated.
@manage_tri ด้วยความยินดีค่ะ
@manage_tri สวัสดีค่ะ กรณีดังกล่าวทีมงานขออนุญาตแนะนำให้ท่านสอบถามโดยตรงกับทางสถานทูตไทย ณ ประเทศที่ท่านอาศัยอยู่นะคะ
@Griffithssarah1 We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. We suggest that you wait for a reply from your agency.
@Griffithssarah1 In this case the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@Tejas44309997 @HardeepSPuri You can choose the refund option as well. You can do that and read for more information at https://t.co/d1axd1fTyn
@Tejas44309997 Greetings, in this case, you can do that and read for more information at https://t.co/d1axd1fTyn
@Griffithssarah1 And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@Griffithssarah1 The booking that is made by the travel agency, if the passengers would like to cancel, they have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system.
@urkzz ด้วยความยินดีค่ะ
@urkzz โดยราคาบัตรโดยสารจะต้องติดต่อสอบถามกับทางสถานทูตนะคะ ทั้งนี้ หากท่านประสงค์จะเดินทางกลับวันดังกล่าวตามประกาศที่มีการเช่าเหมาลำจะต้องติดต่อสถานทูตไทยค่ะ

@LottieEnticknap Greetings, due to the large volume of visitors, the waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this opportunity. The relevant departments will speed up the investigation and get back to you as soon as possible.

@urkzz เนื่องด้วยตามประกาศสำนักการบินพลเรือนแห่งประเทศไทยประกาศปิดทำการบินห้ามทำการบินเข้าสู่ประเทศไทยนะคะ ในกรณีดีงกล่าวจะเป็นเที่ยวบินเช่าเหมาลำซึ่งทางการบินไทยได้รับการติดต่อจากสถานทูตไทยในแต่ละเมือง
@Griffithssarah1 May we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@ASarjam In this case, our staff will contact you back in the queue as soon as possible.

@ASarjam We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@Connor150995 We would like to inform you that canceled flights have not been officially scheduled. If there are changes, we will announce that as soon as possible.
@Connor150995 And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@Connor150995 The booking that is made by the travel agency, if the passengers would like to cancel, they have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system.
@rhiannonlucyc @georgywalks In this case, our staff will respond in order as soon as possible.
@Connor150995 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@georgywalks @rhiannonlucyc Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@rhiannonlucyc @georgywalks We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@Griffithssarah1 Greetings, may we inquire what you may be concerned about?
@georgywalks In this case, our staff will respond in order as soon as possible.
@dawudxdawud 💜💜💜
การบินไทยสนับสนุนภาครัฐรับคนไทยจากออสเตรเลีย และนิวซีแลนด์ กลับไทย 👉🏻 https://t.co/IkVzHxA7kC https://t.co/VpnIk5Jo65

@linda353 สำหรับในกรณีดังกล่าวท่านผู้โดยสารสามารถติดต่อเพื่อขอรับข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ THAI Contact Center 02-356-1111 หลังระบบอัตโนมัติกดเมนูลัด 111 สำหรับเที่ยวบินระหว่างประเทศ  ได้ตลอด 24 ชั่วโมงค่ะ
@mylesfdo Please send an email to reservations@thaiairways.co.uk
@mylesfdo We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@mylesfdo May we ask your city of departure?
@mylesfdo Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@ASarjam Please be patient and waiting for the reply from our related department after they have done the process of investigation, they will reply back to you directly as soon as possible.
@Stefan_baisden We are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@thmshrrr Greetings, we are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. We will proceed to refund as soon as possible.

@janecamilla  We suggest that you contact at email: reservations@thaiairways.co.uk or contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@janecamilla We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR for further assistance.

@sosablair We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@normberetta We would like to recommend that you contact via email at contact@service.thaiairways.com and net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com by informing the following information
1. Name-Surname (English)
2. Reservation Code 
3. Flights and travel dates
4. Intent
@flopietzsch We already following you. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.

@normberetta Hello. We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure to change the time or date of flight at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@RickBar83192380 It would depend on the terms and conditions of the ticket purchased via travel agency. We suggest that you contact the agency for the information. You can contact our THAI office at reservations@thaiairways.co.uk as well.
@flopietzsch Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@RickBar83192380 Greetings, may we ask for your travel route?

@vikramkhanna26 Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@CindyWOO_ We would like to recommend that you contact via email at contact@service.thaiairways.com and net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com the relevant departments will speed up the investigation and get back to you as soon as possible.
@IsabelMyskin Hello. We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@Shriya92652558 We are sorry for the late response. As there are many people contacting THAI ticketing, please wait for a reply from our related department. They will reply back as soon as possible.
@Tejas44309997 In this case will be in accordance with the conditions that we specify only.

@Itsahmad88 We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@Itsahmad88 In this case, we would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR for assistance.
@Itsahmad88 And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@Itsahmad88 The booking that is made by the travel agency, if the passengers would like to cancel, they have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system.
@Itsahmad88 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Joshi_Jaydev @YatraOfficial We suggest that you contact your agency directly to follow up on your case.

@Joshi_Jaydev Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. They will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@anupamchawla_ Please contact your agency regarding the issue, they will coordinate with the airlines directly for a refund.

@anupamchawla_ Greetings. Due to the large volume of visitors, the waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this opportunity. The relevant departments will speed up the investigation and get back to you as soon as possible.

@Tejas44309997 Passengers who booked their tickets through travel agencies are advised to contact their agents for assistance. And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case.
@farazshibli1 @byogauk If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.

data.text: @farazshibli1 @byogauk We suggest that you delete your booking information for security reasons. Thank you for your patience and understanding. And we would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time.
@KatCiabatta Greetings. Could you please provide us more detail via DM? We will reply to you via Direct Message for your inquiry.
@farazshibli1 Greetings, may we ask which channel you make a refund? May we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@sunnyrawal Greetings, we will notify you of updates on flight resume as soon as possible.
@____yous ยินดีมากค่ะ 💜
@joshualeclair1 You too, Joshua!
@____yous ขอเรียนว่าไม่มีนะคะ ทั้งนี้ ท่านสามารถเลือกซื้อสินค้า (ขนมปังอื่นๆ)ได้ที่ LINE MAN  search คำว่า Thai Catering (Puff&Pie) ค่ะหรือเลือกชม ได้ที่ https://t.co/nKx5QhmMLd ค่ะ
@pratik_1245 Please wait until they getting back to you.
@pratik_1245 Please contact our THAI office in London about this issue.
@pratik_1245 May we ask for your travel route?

@pratik_1245 We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the information. However, we suggest that you contact our THAI office in the city of your departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR in order to give you further information.
@pratik_1245 Greetings, normally, an e-mail stating flight cancellation will be sent to your e-mail that you fill when you make a reservation or you may visit https://t.co/uRpsBEVL8G
@jukjikjubjib @aroii ทางทีมงานขอขอบพระคุณที่ท่านให้การสนับสนุนสินค้าฝ่ายครัวการบินไทยค่ะ ทั้งนี้ท่านสามารถสั่งซื้อผ่าน LINE MAN ได้อีกด้วยนะคะ

data.text: @zeneith We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons. And we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to refund make any alterations to your ticket.

@RichardM1989 We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.

@roshnirebecca We are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will contact you as quickly as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
